name: The Red Tunnels of Zacresh
description:
In a spent quarry gapes a suppurating wound in the clay. The ghosts were driven here when war came down from the north. They guard the last of their wealth desperately.

Features:

  1. Ten unpleasant rooms
  2. Six horrid encounters
  3. Some treasure
  4. A map
  5. Sentences
  6. All statted out forBastards.
